con.para: Energy is the ability to do work! It makes things move, light up, and power machines.
Energy comes in many forms: heat, light, sound, electrical, and more!

con.title: Energy Can't Be Created or Destroyed

con.para: Energy can’t be made or destroyed, it just changes from one form to another. This is called the Law of Conservation of Energy!
Potential energy is stored energy. It's energy that’s waiting to be used, like a ball sitting at the top of a hill.
Kinetic energy is energy in motion! Anything that moves has kinetic energy, like a car driving or a ball rolling.
Heat energy comes from things like the Sun, fire, and even your body! It makes things warmer.
Electrical energy powers all your favorite devices, like your phone, TV, and lights.
Light energy lets us see things and comes from sources like the Sun and lamps. Without light, we would live in darkness!
Work happens when a force moves an object. When you push or pull something, you're using energy to do work!
You use energy all the time—when you play, cook, or even sleep! Can you spot energy being used in your life?
